title: Section Manager, Scheduling Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital
Interview Descriptions: very professional, informative, and very easy to follow. instructions were clear and a link provided for direct reference if needed. HR representative knew his information and policies. The interview process defiantly swayed my decision-making. The director also knew her team and properly outlined what she was looking for.
Interview Questions: What task was a challenge in your current position?

title: Helpdesk Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Friendly and the questions tested my technical skills. Answered some scenario based questions. Answered questions about my personality. They also wanted to know my willingness to learn and how I handle pressure situation. Overall great experience.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a doctor not having access to their records?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Easy going, talked to nursing recruiter and director of nursing both personal and easy to talk to. I felt a connection with them right away. They seemed like they will be supportive throughout my time here.
Interview Questions: How did I deal with a conflict with a coworker?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (Yonkers, NY) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very quick, no actual questions, straight forward. I just talked about my experience working in a different pharmacy setting and about how I can contribute to this workforce. Interview is very short and easy, mostly a walkthrough of expectations as a pharmacy technician.
Interview Questions: No actual questions other than: “Do you have any questions?”

title: Accounting Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (Yonkers, NY) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: You meet with head of financial and  manager for about a one hour interview. Then the wait was a bout 2 days to hear. Then if hired you go to orientation then you start.
Interview Questions: What did you do in your previous job

title: Unit Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (Yonkers, NY) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: First I interviewed with HR and then I went up and interviewed with the Nurses manager. Interview was very brief they didn’t ask much. Waiting on a call back letting me know whether I got the job or not.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (Yonkers, NY) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Initially I met with HR representative, for about 15 minutes. After that I was then taken to meet with the department admin and hiring manager. I sat with both people who then asked a few questions, as well as gave me a detailed rundown of their unit. They both were very upfront in regards to shift availability, orientation, and travel being that the hospital is in Yonkers.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this speciality ?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very unorganized. None of the standard interview questions were asked. The interviewer only discussed my resume with me. Two of the nurse managers I met with were not very professional, and didn't seem interested in interviewing me.
Interview Questions: Give an example of a time you maintained composure under stress.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (Yonkers, NY) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: Took about a week and a half from the date of interview to when I received an offer, then two weeks to start. i interviewed with HR and then sent up to the floor supervisor. The interview was short and sweet and to the point.
Interview Questions:
Where do you see yourself in five years?
Why do you want to work for us

title: Ccma Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The manager and staff were professional and have deep interest and very knowledgeable about the company. The culture is one designed on teamwork and world-class customer-service-which fits my philosophy perfectly.
Interview Questions: How do you handle a coworker who seems upset?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (New York, NY) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Sent the VP of physician services a copy of my resume. He called me within the week to schedule an interview. The interview process wasn't too difficult, although he did throw a couple of questions in there that caught me off guard.

title: CRCST Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital (Yonkers, NY) in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions: One on one interview. Received a phone call from the director of the department asking for an interview. Followed up a few days later to schedule and once interviewed got an answer on the spot and prepared for orientation.
Interview Questions: Do you think you are overqualified for this position?

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Johns Riverside Hospital in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: A brief yet thorough interview. Extensive background check and health screening. Received a brief tour of the facility at the conclusion of the interview. f f f f ff f f f  f f ff  f  f f ff  ff f
